languages.text: Наносит удвоенный {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичный урон{/g}. Каждая успешная атака этим оружием усиливает наложенный на цель эффект {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} на 1.
languages.original_text: Deals double toxic damage. Increases the power of toxin inflicted by +1 for each successful hit.

traits.locale_text: Наносит удвоенный токсичный урон. Каждое попадание этим оружием увеличивает уровень наложенного отравления на 1.
Наносит удвоенный токсичный урон. Каждое попадание этим оружием увеличивает уровень наложенного отравления на 1.

languages.text: Deals double {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Each successful attack with this weapon increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect suffered by a target by +1.
languages.original_text: Наносит удвоенный {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичный урон{/g}. Каждое {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием увеличивает уровень наложенного {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} на 1.

traits.locale_text: Deals double toxic damage. Increases the power of toxin inflicted by +1 for each successful hit.
Deals double toxic damage. Increases the power of toxin inflicted by +1 for each successful hit.

languages.text: 造成双倍{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。每次命中敌人时，都会使目标承受的{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高1点。
languages.original_text: Deals double {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Each successful attack with this weapon increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect suffered by a target by +1.

traits.locale_text: 造成双倍{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。每次命中敌人时，都会使目标承受的{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高1点。
造成双倍{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。每次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}的伤害都会提高1点。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g}を2倍付与。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する度に{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}のパワー+1
languages.original_text: Deals double {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Increases the power of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by +1 for each successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g}を2倍付与。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}する度に{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}のパワー+1

languages.text: Inflige doble de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}. Cada vez que se acierte un ataque con esta arma, el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} del efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} que sufre el objetivo aumenta en +1.
languages.original_text: Deals double {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Each successful attack with this weapon increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect suffered by a target by +1.

traits.locale_text: Inflige doble de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}. Cada vez que se acierte un ataque con esta arma, el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} del efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} que sufre el objetivo aumenta en +1.

Causa el doble de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}. Aumenta el poder del efecto {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} causado +1 por cada {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} realizado con éxito.

languages.text: Fügt doppelten {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} zu. Erhöht die zugefügte Schadenswirkung von {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} +1, und zwar für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g}.
languages.original_text: Deals double {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Increases the power of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by +1 for each successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Fügt doppelten {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} zu. Erhöht die zugefügte Schadenswirkung von {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} +1, und zwar für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g}.

Fügt doppelten {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} zu. Erhöht die zugefügte Schadenswirkung von {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} +1, und zwar für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g}.

languages.text: Double les {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. Chaque attaque réussie portée avec cette arme augmente de +1 les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} induits par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} affectant une cible.
languages.original_text: Deals double {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Each successful attack with this weapon increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect suffered by a target by +1.

traits.locale_text: Double les {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. Chaque attaque réussie portée avec cette arme augmente de +1 les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} induits par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} affectant une cible.

Double les {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. Augmente de +1 la puissance de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} infligé pour chaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} porté.

Double les {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. Chaque attaque réussie portée avec cette arme augmente de +1 les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} induits par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} affectant une cible.
